Interesting History: I Purchased this guitar rig from a Cruise Ship Musician, a real pro. The musician explained: This was his practice rig, no stage time. Professionally Respected. He bought this Epip LP because it kinda felt similar to his 1960 Gibson LP Standard. I played both, and the 1960 LP just isn't worth all that extra money (sorry Gibson). Check out the High Def Images of this rig. If you have any questions, please ask. __________________________Guitar Specs__________________________ The Build - The Sound - The Playability, The Looks...I love it.
